--0-807089069-1280252193=:79810
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:

1) you hope =
what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i called it in or perhaps bo=
th?=C2=A0 



I hope you called it in. Your resistance to giving the police=
 
information you said you thought you had on a child abductor, even after =

several prompts, makes me hope you did call it in, and didn't just say 
th=
at to stop me from prompting you. I don't know of course, I am not 
there. =
I have no desire that you make a fool of yourself, but if it 
helps save a =
child from am abductor, I think it would be worth it.

2) Why don't you get=
 on the box, and do some asking? 

As I have said in the past, my experienc=
e with those boxes has shown me nothing paranormal yet.=C2=A0 However, peop=
le continue to say there is more to it than my experience.=C2=A0 And so, I =
am keeping an open mind and trying to examine the evidence you provide.

3)=
 Why are negative people on these lists anyway. if you guys don't believe
 =
in this type of technology, why the heck are you all here? 

If I had absol=
ulely no belief that there might be something interesting going on with the=
 technology, I would not have been so insistent that you give your informat=
ion to the police.=C2=A0 How could a person, of good conscience, not prompt=
 you to give that information to the police?=C2=A0 Again how is that a nega=
tive thing to do?

Wouldn't the really negative thing be to ignore it?




=

I don't think you should lie to the p=
olice.=C2=A0 If you have information on a missing child, call and tell them=
.=C2=A0 Especially if it might help keep another child safe, especially if =
you are wrong and they don't pick him up 'soon enough'.

i could=
 just call them, and say i heard it from a psychic or something, at least i=
t would give them a hint, spirit said that the guy was hanging around the c=
amp grounds during the day, and left, then came back, i have no idea how he=
 would get that little boy out of a tent, with the whole sleeping family in=
 it with him, i think spirit said, he got him out, then took him away, but =
from what i am hearing, and i could be wrong, very wrong, i really hope i a=
m wrong.=C2=A0 The man is a pedophile is what they said, from what the tech=
 said, they will catch him soon.=C2=A0 "They will pick him up." 

     
   =
   
 One group of spirit said, they know who he is, well, what should i do?=
 sf

When you label the files with what you heard, you influence the listener t=
o try to hear what you heard, rather than what they hear with no hints.=C2=
=A0 So if you want to know what people really hear without your hints, you =
need to send them out unlabeled.
